net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource

Interface CompositeResourceFilter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompositeResourceFilterImpl

    public interface CompositeResourceFilter
    Filter for composite resources.

    Filter are instantiated each time a composite resource is served.

    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Method Detail

      • getWrappingInputStream

        @Nullable
Class<? extends FilterInputStream> getWrappingInputStream()
        Get the wrapping stream class. Must have a constructor that takes an input stream as an argument.

        This is used exclusive of getWrappingOutputStream().

        Returns:
        the stream or null if not supported.
        See Also:
        FilterInputStream

      • getWrappingOutputStream

        @Nullable
Class<? extends FilterOutputStream> getWrappingOutputStream()
        Get the wrapping stream class. Must have a constructor that takes an input stream as an argument.

        This is used exclusive of getWrappingInputStream().

        Returns:
        the stream or null if not supported.
        See Also:
        FilterInputStream
